    • Constructor Detail

      • PrintHelper

        public PrintHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • printJobSheet

        public void printJobSheet(Job job,
                          boolean print)
        Prints a job sheet for a Job. This exports a job sheet as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief. The title of the text file will be 'JOB_SHEET_[JOB_ID].txt'.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to create the job sheet from.
        print - whether the job sheet should be sent to the printer.
        See Also:
        Job

      • printJobInvoice

        public void printJobInvoice(Invoice invoice,
                            boolean print)
        Prints an invoice for a Job. This exports an invoice as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief. The title of the text file will be 'INVOICE_JOB_[JOB_ID].txt'.
        Parameters:
        invoice - the invoice to create the text file from.
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.
        See Also:
        Invoice, Job

      • printPartOrderInvoice

        public void printPartOrderInvoice(PartOrder order,
                                  boolean print)
        Prints an invoice for a PartOrder. This saves the invoice as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief.
        Parameters:
        order - the order from which the invoice will be created from.
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.
        See Also:
        PartOrder

      • filePathForType

        public java.lang.String filePathForType(java.lang.String type)
        Gets a formatted String for the file name. The current date is added to the end of the file name to ensure better organisation.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of file to be saves.
        Returns:
        the final file path for the file to be saved.

      • printStockLedger

        public void printStockLedger(boolean print)
        Prints the current stock levels. This saves the stock ledger as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief.
        Parameters:
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.
        See Also:
        Stock

      • printAverageTimeReport

        public void printAverageTimeReport(boolean print)
        Prints the average time report. This saves the report as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief.
        Parameters:
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.

      • printPriceReport

        public void printPriceReport(boolean print)
        Prints the average price report. This saves the report as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief.
        Parameters:
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.

      • printReportVehiclesBooked

        public void printReportVehiclesBooked(boolean print)
        Prints the number of vehicles booked report. This saves the report as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief.
        Parameters:
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.
        See Also:
        Vehicle

      • printCustomerRecords

        public void printCustomerRecords(boolean print)
        Prints all customer records. * This saves the records as a text file in the same format as the example in the Brief.
        Parameters:
        print - whether the text file should be sent to the printer.
        See Also:
        Customer
